snippet: Relatives and former colleagues gathered for a remembrance of Arthur Ochs Sulzberger, who guided The New York Times through more than three decades of turbulence and growth.
abstract: Relatives and former colleagues gather for a memorial tribute to Arthur Ochs Sulzberger, known as Punch, who, as chairman, chief executive and publisher, guided The New York Times through more than three decades of turbulence and growth.
lead_paragraph: Relatives and former colleagues gathered for a remembrance of Arthur Ochs Sulzberger, who guided The New York Times through more than three decades of turbulence and growth.

headline.seo: The Times Pays Tribute to Arthur Ochs Sulzberger
headline.main: The Times Pays Tribute to a Publisher Called Punch
headline.print_headline: The Times Pays Tribute to a Publisher Called ‘Punch’
